mapper.select:
select
from om_pick_head ph where material_status = #{materialStatus}
and ph.pick_no like '%' #{pickNo} '%'
and ph.order_no like '%' #{orderNo} '%'
and ph.correspondProject like '%' #{correspondProject} '%'
order by ph.create_time desc

select pl.package_id as printLabelId,pl.material_no as materialNo,ma.material_name as materialName,ma.material_desc as materialDesc,pl.num as num from om_pick_head ph left join om_pick_label pil on ph.pick_head_id = pil.pick_head_id left join si_print_label pl on pil.print_label_id = pl.print_label_id left join si_material ma on pl.material_no = ma.material_no where ph.pick_no = #{pickNo} and ph.dr=1 and pl.dr=1

select ma.material_no as materialNo,ma.material_name as materialName,ma.material_desc as materialDesc,pb.demand_num as demandNum,pb.pick_num as pickNum, (pb.demand_num-pb.pick_num) as LackNum as material_loss_num from om_pick_head ph left join om_pick_body pb on ph.pick_head_id = pb.pick_head_id left join si_material ma on pb.material_no = ma.material_no where ph.dr =1 and ph.pick_no = #{pickNo}
and ma.material_no like '%' #{materialNo} '%'
and ma.materialName like '%' #{materialName} '%'
and material_loss_num <=0
